Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Concisely \Con*cise"ly\, adv. In a concise manner; briefly. [1913 Webster]

concisely adv : in a concise manner; in a few words; "the history is summed up concisely in this book"; "she replied briefly"; "briefly, we have a problem"; "to put it shortly" [syn: {briefly}, {shortly}, {in brief}, {in short}]
